documents.document: Urine smell My list of problems: Urine smell in elevator; no hot water, toilet keeps running; ice machine leaks has large puddle in hallway; no fly screen on window(they claimed it was broken); room dirty after cleaning; I had to call to get clean towels; hookers in hallway( I have kids); clerks are rude with poor English; front desk won't answers calls. Nothing personal, its just a dump.
